name: authflow
description: A CLI tool to simulate and test ForgeRock/Ping Identity Cloud authentication journeys

scripts.build:binary: npm run build && pkg dist/cli/authflow.js --output build/authflow
scripts.build:mac-arm: npm run build && pkg dist/cli/authflow.js --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output build/authflow
scripts.build:all: npm run build && pkg dist/cli/authflow.js --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-macos-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-win-x64 --out-path build
